name: Displace (itch)
description:
Who says you can't shoot all of your problems away, in this game you can literally! A wall built in your path, a lazer stopping you robbing the bank? Well no more! The displacement camera 5000 sends all your problems to a parallel universe where its there problem now...

Controls

ActionControlMovementA,S,W,DJumpSpaceTake a PhotoF

Credit

Programming: Jonathan Carter (https://jonathan.carter.games/)

Art: Hannah Blachford (https://www.artstation.com/hblachford)

Sound: 

  • Cash Register SFX - kiddpark (https://freesound.org/people/kiddpark/sounds/201159/)
  • Photo Capture SFX - sonoplastico (https://freesound.org/people/sonoplastico/sounds/98001/)
  • Ding SFX - InspectorJ (https://freesound.org/people/InspectorJ/sounds/484344/)
  • Whoosh SFX - alanmcki (https://freesound.org/people/alanmcki/sounds/461017/)
  • Music from https://filmmusic.io
    "Touching Moments One - Pulse" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
